games.title: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild
games.description: An open-world adventure game that allows players to explore the vast kingdom of Hyrule.

games.title: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
games.description: A story-driven open-world RPG set in a visually stunning fantasy universe full of meaningful choices and impactful consequences.

games.title: Dark Souls III
games.description: A challenging, genre-defining game filled with relentless enemies, treacherous traps, and hidden secrets.

games.title: Overwatch
games.description: A team-based multiplayer first-person shooter with a wide array of unique heroes, fast-paced and fun gameplay, and characters with rich stories.

games.title: Super Mario Odyssey
games.description: An open-world 3D platformer with a variety of gameplay mechanics, including exploration, puzzle-solving, and action.
